954130.name: Nancy Drew: Sea of Darkness - Soundtrack
954130.description:
Whether you’re on or between cases, the soundtracks from Nancy Drew
games are a great inspiration for super sleuths! Size: 34.5MB

Composed by Thomas Regin
“The Word I Couldn’t Keep” is an original song composed by Thomas Regin, performed by Billie Wildrick with lyrics written by Katie Chironis.
